document_data.name: ''Sune's Laurel of Favor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sune's Laurel of Favor''''' was a [[divine]]ly [[enchanted]] [[wreath]] from the [[Seldarine's Hand]] citadel on the [[Spine of the World]].
document_data.Description: This never-wilting wreath was made out of woven together [[bay leaf|laurel]] leaves and [[rose]]s.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of this garland was blessed with beauty and charisma, as well as magical protection from harm, similar to that of a ''+1'' enchantment.
document_data.History: ''Sune's Laurel of Favor'' was a gift of peace and comradely from the [[human]] [[Church of Sune]] to the [[cleric]]s of the [[Church of Hanali Celanil]] in the citadel of the Seldarine's Hand. The gift helped cementing kinship between the churches and the [[elf|elven]] priestesses of Hanali wore ''Sune's Laurel of Favor'' every time they were visited by humans. When the citadel fell, [[orc]] invaders tossed the magic wreath into piles of garbage. That is where ''Sune's Laurel of Favor'' remained as of the {{YearlinkName|1281}}.
